item.title: 人工智能即将在政治领域大显身手
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 谷歌将提供有关金融搜索的 Kalshi 和 Polymarket 数据
item.description: 随着谷歌达成协议，将把 Kalshi Inc. 和 Polymarket 的预测市场数据导入其金融平台，赌博的触角正在深入投资生态系统。【原文：Gambling’s reach is extending deeper into the investment ecosystem as Google strikes a deal to pipe prediction market data from Kalshi Inc. and Polymarket into its finance platform.】

item.title: 沃伦证实摩根大通为美国财政部购买阿根廷比索
item.description: 据参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）周四发出的两封信称，摩根大通银行上个月代表美国财政部购买了阿根廷比索，因为美国国务卿斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）试图在关键的大选前支持该国的自由主义领导人。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. bought Argentine pesos last month on behalf of the US Treasury as Secretary Scott Bessent tried to shore up the country’s libertarian leader before a pivotal election, according to two letters sent Thursday by Senator Elizabeth Warren.】

item.title: 受贸易不确定性影响，墨西哥银行将利率下调四分之一个百分点
item.description: 在疲软的第三季度数据加剧了经济衰退的担忧之后几天，墨西哥央行将借贷成本降低了四分之一个百分点，延长了货币宽松周期。【原文：Mexico’s central bank lowered borrowing costs by a quarter point, extending its monetary easing cycle days after weak third-quarter data fueled recession fears.】

item.title: 苹果重获避险天堂地位，人工智能贸易前景黯淡
item.description: 从英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）到 Palantir 科技公司（Palantir Technologies Inc：苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Another broad selloff that dented high-flying AI trades from Nvidia Corp. to Palantir Technologies Inc. left an old stalwart of the tech sector unscathed: Apple Inc.】

item.title: 天空电视台所有者康卡斯特正在洽谈收购 ITV 广播业务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，欧洲天空付费电视业务的所有者康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp.【原文：Comcast Corp., owner of the Sky pay-television business in Europe, is in talks to acquire ITV Plc’s media and entertainment unit in a deal that would dramatically shake up the UK broadcasting landscape, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 加密货币混合器联合创始人在洗钱案中被判五年监禁
item.description: 加密货币混合公司 Samourai Wallet 的一名联合创始人因经营一家从非法暗网交易和欺诈计划中洗钱数亿美元的公司而被判处五年监禁。【原文：A co-founder of cryptocurrency mixer Samourai Wallet was ordered to spend five years behind bars for running a business that laundered hundreds of millions of dollars from illegal dark web transactions and fraud schemes.】

item.title: First Brands 表示需要 6 亿美元，否则 "游戏结束"。
item.description: First Brands 集团的律师表示，该公司需要获得大约 6 亿美元的剩余破产融资，以避免这家汽车零部件公司立即停业。【原文：First Brands Group lawyers said the company needs access to its roughly $600 million of remaining bankruptcy financing to keep the auto-parts firm from shutting down immediately.】

item.title: 私人飞机扎堆给飞往里斯本的科技巨头带来不便
item.description: 在美国旅客为全国机场因政府规定的运力限制而陷入混乱做准备的时候，飞往葡萄牙参加会议的技术高管们却面临着一个更无足轻重的挫折：私人飞机缺乏着陆位置。【原文：As US travelers brace for chaos at airports across the country due to government-mandated capacity curbs, technology executives flying into a conference in Portugal face an altogether more frivolous frustration: a lack of landing slots for private jets.】

item.title: 社交媒体巨头必须接受成瘾指控审判
item.description: 一名法官裁定，Meta Platforms Inc.、ByteDance Ltd.、Alphabet Inc.和 Snap Inc.必须就其设计的社交媒体平台让青少年上瘾的指控接受审判，这为数以千计的案件中第一批提交给陪审团的案件扫清了道路。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc., ByteDance Ltd., Alphabet Inc. and Snap Inc. must face trial over claims that they designed social media platforms to addict youths, a judge ruled, clearing the way for the first of thousands of cases to be presented to juries.】

item.title: BillionToOne 首次公开募股规模扩大至 2.73 亿美元，股价大涨 67
item.description: 分子诊断公司 BillionToOne Inc. 在首次公开募股中筹集了 2.731 亿美元，首次上市后股价大涨 67%。【原文：BillionToOne Inc. shares jumped 67% in their debut after the molecular diagnostics company raised $273.1 million in an upsized initial public offering.】

item.title: 美国银行任命英国投资银行业务新领导人
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）为其英国投资银行业务挑选了新的领导人，这家华尔街银行希望深化在该地区的业务。【原文：Bank of America Corp. has picked new leaders for its UK investment banking as the Wall Street bank looks to deepen its footprint in the region.】

item.title: 华尔街银行考虑为 Hologic 120 亿美元债务交易动用私人信贷
item.description: 据知情人士透露，华尔街的一些银行正在考虑引入私人信贷公司参与 122.5 亿美元债务融资中的一部分，以支持 Blackstone Inc.【原文：A group of Wall Street banks are considering bringing in private credit firms on a portion of a $12.25 billion debt financing to support Blackstone Inc. and TPG Inc.’s acquisition of medical device-maker Hologic Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 伯恩斯坦认为预测市场将推动 Robinhood 和 Coinbase 的发展
item.description: 预测市场刚刚获得了新的卖方合法印章。在一份新的报告中，伯恩斯坦称预测市场是一种可行的资产类别，并认为曾经看似新奇的赌注，如今正在主流金融的基础上建立起来，并得到了真实资本、真实用户和监管机构的支持。【原文：Prediction markets just got a fresh sell-side stamp of legitimacy. In a new report, Bernstein calls them a viable asset class — arguing that what once looked like novelty bets are now being built into the foundations of mainstream finance, backed by real capital, real users and regulatory approval.】

item.title: 法国公司寻求德国批准俄罗斯设计的核燃料
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）的 Framatome 部门正在寻求德国批准本月开始生产俄罗斯设计的核燃料组件，以便明年向捷克共和国和保加利亚的反应堆供货。【原文：Electricite de France SA’s Framatome unit is seeking German approval to start making Russian-designed nuclear-fuel assemblies this month, with a view to supplying reactors in the Czech Republic and Bulgaria next year.】

item.title: 高通公司首席执行官称世界低估了人工智能的发展前景
item.description: 人工智能的前景已经颠覆了经济，并为英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：The promise of artificial intelligence has already upended the economy and added trillions of dollars in market value to companies like Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 诺和诺德增持肥胖症初创公司 Metsera
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）与辉瑞公司（Pfizer Inc.【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S has again increased its offer for Metsera Inc., people familiar with the matter said, as its takeover battle with Pfizer Inc. for the obesity startup escalates.】

item.title: 官员称国际货币基金组织正 "尽可能快地 "推进塞内加尔新政
item.description: 国际货币基金组织代表团团长爱德华-杰马耶勒（Edward Gemayel）在会谈后表示，国际货币基金组织正在努力为塞内加尔达成一项新方案，以解决数十亿美元未披露债务造成的国家财政紧张问题。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is working hard to reach a new program for Senegal, mission chief Edward Gemayel said following talks to resolve the fallout from billions of dollars in undisclosed debt that have strained the nation’s finances.】

item.title: 英国央行前景暗淡，英国预算悬而未决
item.description: 英格兰银行利用其定期商业调查警告说，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯将在商业投资疲软、失业率上升和经济增长放缓的严峻背景下公布其预算。【原文：The Bank of England used its regular business survey to warn that UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will unveil her budget against a grim backdrop of weak business investment, rising unemployment and slowing growth.】

item.title: 收益疲软，私人信贷巨头捍卫业绩记录
item.description: 自私人信贷风险的口水战在备受瞩目的倒闭事件之后爆发以来，投资者首次获得了有关 1.7 万亿美元债务市场状况的确凿数据。【原文：For the first time since a war of words erupted over the risks in private credit in the wake of high-profile collapses, investors are getting hard figures on the state of the $1.7 trillion debt market.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率连降四周后升至 6.22
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率在连续四周下降后出现攀升，这一逆转将进一步加剧购房者的负担能力。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US climbed after four weeks of declines, a reversal that will further strain affordability for buyers.】

item.title: 美联储哈马克称通胀比劳动力市场更令人担忧
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）表示，货币政策应继续对通胀施加下行压力，她认为通胀过高，对美国央行而言，通胀风险仍大于劳动力市场疲软。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said monetary policy should continue putting downward pressure on inflation, which she says is too high and remains a bigger risk for the US central bank than labor-market weakness.】

item.title: 墨西哥航空公司集团在首次公开募股和配售 3 亿美元后走高
item.description: 墨西哥航空公司集团公司（Grupo Aeromexico SAB）在首次公开募股（IPO）和私募融资约 3 亿美元后，其美国存托股票出现上涨，这是该公司在三年前退市后重返公开市场。【原文：Grupo Aeromexico SAB’s American depositary shares edged up after the company raised about $300 million in an IPO and private placement, returning to public markets after delisting three years ago.】

item.title: 克罗格审查结果公布前，Ocado 股价跌至 12 年低点
item.description: 由于投资者对美国合作伙伴克罗格公司（Kroger Co.【原文：Ocado Group Plc shares fell to the lowest level in more than 12 years as investors grow nervous awaiting the outcome of a strategic review by US partner Kroger Co.】

item.title: 经过漫长的竞购战，MEG 股东批准了 Cenovus 收购案
item.description: MEG Energy Corp. 股东同意被 Cenovus Energy Inc. 收购，在此之前，该公司经历了长达五个月的激烈竞购战，并多次努力争取足够的支持以获得交易批准。【原文：MEG Energy Corp. shareholders agreed to be acquired by Cenovus Energy Inc. after a dramatic five-month bidding war and multiple attempts to secure enough support to get the deal approved.】

item.title: MUFG 称，一旦停摆数据失效，美元将重现跌势
item.description: MUFG 的 Derek Halpenny 认为，美国联邦政府重新开张后，一旦官方劳动力数据公布，美元将再次遭到抛售，这将缩短美元近期的反弹势头。【原文：The dollar will see renewed selling once official labor data are released when the US federal government reopens, cutting short its recent comeback, according to MUFG’s Derek Halpenny.】

item.title: 富国银行称美国公司将在 2026 年增加借贷
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）预计，明年蓝筹公司（尤其是进行大规模人工智能投资的大型科技公司）将利用有利的融资条件，从美国债券市场借入更多资金。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. expects blue-chip companies — particularly large technology firms funding massive artificial intelligence investments — to borrow more from the US bond market next year, taking advantage of favorable financing conditions.】

item.title: 印度监管机构讨论允许银行进行大宗商品交易
item.description: 印度证券市场监管机构和中央银行正在探讨允许商业贷款机构进行商品衍生品交易的前景，此举旨在深化该资产类别的流动性。【原文：India’s securities market regulator and its central bank are exploring the prospect of allowing commercial lenders to trade in commodity derivatives, a move aimed at deepening liquidity in the asset class.】

item.title: 英国电网被数据中心的连接请求压得喘不过气来
item.description: 英国国家电网公司（National Grid Plc）表示，由于科技公司急于增加大量新的处理能力，数据中心现在主要提出与网络连接的要求。【原文：The UK’s National Grid Plc said requests to link up to the network are now dominated by data centers as tech firms rush to add vast quantities of new processing power.】

item.title: 贝利称将任满京东方董事会任期以回击法拉奇
item.description: 安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，他打算继续担任英格兰银行行长直至任期届满，并回应了民粹主义领袖奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）的言论。【原文：Andrew Bailey said he intends to remain governor of the Bank of England until his term expires, addressing comments from populist leader Nigel Farage who has suggested he would replace Bailey if he became prime minister.】
